data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited ('the Company') at its meeting held today i.e. 27th July, 2023 considered and approved financial results along with other items of business.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we forward herewith the transcript of the conference call with investors and analysts held on Thursday, 25th May, 2023 for the Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) financial result of the company for the quarter and Year ended 31st March, 2023.This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: With reference to our letter dated 23rd May, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 (2)(ao) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of the Investors' Conference Call on the Financial Results for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year Ended 31st March, 2023 is available on the Company's website at:https://www.shyammetalics.com/investors/investors-analyst-meet/Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Result Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Fourth Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023, duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee along with Audit Report (with unmodified opinion) as issued by S K Agrawal and Co. Chartered Accountants LLP, the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

A copy of the said results together with the Audit Report for Fourth Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023 are enclosed herewith. These are also being made available on the website of the Company at www.shyammetalics.com.

data.news_body: With reference to our letters dated 04th and 07th November, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 (2)(ao) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of the Investors' Conference Call on the Financial Results for the Second Quarter and Half Year Ended 30th September, 2022 is available on the Company's website at:https://www.shyammetalics.com/wp-content/themes/shyam/assets/investors/announcement/SMEL-Q2-Concall-Audio.mp3Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: With reference to our letters dated 04th and 07th November, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 (2)(ao) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of the Investors' Conference Call on the Financial Results for the Second Quarter and Half Year Ended 30th September, 2022 is available on the Company's website at:https://www.shyammetalics.com/wp-content/themes/shyam/assets/investors/announcement/SMEL-Q2-Concall-Audio.mp3Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Revised Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended On 30.09.2022
data.news_body:
This is in reference to our letter no. SMEL/SE/2022-23/48 dated 9th November, 2022 in regard to the intimation of the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year
ended 30th September 2022 as considered and approved by the Board of Directors of Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited ('the company') at its meeting held today i.e. 9th
November, 2022.
We would like to inform that inadvertently incorrect page of Consolidated Statement of Cash Flow has been signed and uploaded. Accordingly, we are again uploading herewith
the revised financial statements incorporating the correct Consolidated Statement of Cash Flow.
Kindly take the same on record and oblige.
Regret the inconvenience caused.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended On 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited ('the company') at its meeting held today i.e.                9th November, 2022 inter-alia considered and approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 09Th November, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited ('the company') at its meeting held today i.e.  9th November, 2022 inter-alia considered and approved the matters enumerated in the enclosed Outcome.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we forward herewith the transcript of the conference call with investors and analysts held on Wednesday,3rd August, 2022 for the un-audited (standalone and consolidated) financial result of the company for the quarter ended 30th June,2022.This is for your information and record.Thanking You,

data.caption: Unaudited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results For The Quarter Ended On 30Th June, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33, the Board Approved the Un-audited Financial Results (both Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2022, duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee along with Limited Review Report as issued by M/s S K Agrawal and Co Chartered Accountants LLP, Chartered Accountants, the Statutory Auditors of the Company.

A copy of the said results together with the Limited Review Report for Quarter ended 30th June, 2022 are enclosed herewith. These are also being made available on the website of the Company at www.shyammetalics.com
